text: manitarkal irakkumpolutum, irakkamal nittiraiyil irukkum polutum allahve avarkalutaiya uyiraik kaipparrukiran. Pinnar, evarkal mitu maranam vitikkappattato avarkalutaiya uyirai(t tannitame) niruttik kolkiran. Marravarka(lin uyirka)lai, kurippitappatta kalamvarai vala avan avarkalitame anuppivitukiran. Cintikkakkutiya makkalukku, niccayamaka itil pala patippinaikal irukkinrana
